body:
This topic was inspired by Y0urm0m1's post on the OCN forums https://oc.tc/forums/topics/533f491512ca95c2b10003fb (sorry if thats advertising!)
**If you would like for me to archive this topic, Yourmom, I will do it.**



          This is a topic for anyone who is new to the Avicus server. This topic will tell you all about the slang words, some important rules, how to have fun, and much more! Let's get started!

Slang Words Used On Avicus

          There are many different types of "slang" words used on this server. Some are meant to be funny, some are very rude. Here is an extremely long list of slang words and definitions that you will probably get bored of reading.


1. Lol - Translates to "Laugh out loud"
2. Lmao/Lmfao - Translates to "Laughed my ass off" or "Laughed my f*****g ass off"
3. Nvm - Translates to "Never mind"
4. Rofl - Translates to "Rolls on floor laughing"
5. GG - Translates to "Good game"
6. eZ - Translates to "Easy" usually used to say someone is bad at pvp
7. BG - Translates to "Bad game" usually used by bad sports.
8. Bae - Usually means something like best friend
9. Bb - Baby, Best buddy, etc.
10. Iloominatey - http://imgur.com/gallery/xhkQm
11. Gtfo - Translates to "Get the f**k out!"
12. Ur - Means "your" or "you're" 
13. K/Kk/Ok - These all translate to "Okay"
14. FTW - Translates to "F**k the world" or "For the win/world"
15. Brb - Translates to "be right back"
16. Tbh - Translates to "To be honest"
17. Gtg - Translates to "Got to go"
18. M8 - Exactly what it sounds like, mate 
19. ATM - "At the moment" or "At this moment"
20. OMG/OMFG - "Oh my god/gosh" or "Oh my f******g god/gosh!"
21. TDM - Stands for "Team deathmatch" 
22. DTM - Stands for "Destroy the Monument"
23. CTH - Stands for "Control the Hill"
24. SG - Stands for "Survival Games"
25. HG - Stands for "Hunger Games"
26. CTW - Stands for "Capture the Wool"

Rules for Avicus

          Avicus is a server with many simple rules. Following these guidelines will give you a clean infractions list. I will only be sharing a few rules, the ones that I think are the most important.

Bullying

          Bullying is perhaps the worst way to break a rule. This is harassing, abusing, and being rude to other players. This can result in many different punishments depending on the severity. Don't do it. It will build a very bad reputation.

Hacking

          First of all, never ever ever ever ever accuse another player of hacking in chat. Many do not know this, but it is against the rules. It gives the hacker a chance to turn off his hacks when a Staff member join the game to spectate them, letting them roam free. If you believe a player is hacking always use /report (player) (hacker).

Advertising

          Posting another server's IP ingame, on the forums, or anything like that is strictly prohibited. Advertisers are people who don't care for the server, they just want more players on other servers. Nothing else to say.

The rest are available at www.avicus.net/rules

Having Fun

          Always have a clean atmosphere. Be nice to players. One thing you shouldn't do is "mini-mod'. This is when a player acts like a moderator and sometimes even impersonate as one. But, this does not mean players can help enforce the rules. Make sure that other players are having as much as fun as you are.

Ranks

         Have you ever wondered why there are people with the tags Gold, Diamond, or Emerald? Well, those are Avicus' donation ranks. In order to find out what each rank does, go here http://avicus.net/shop

Anyways, Gold is the cheapest, Emerald is the second cheapest, and Diamond is the most expensive.

Gold - 25 USD
Emerald - 50 USD
Diamond - 100 USD


I will continue to update this topic, but please leave suggestions down below. Thanks for reading!

Some Stuff:
ts.avicus.net = TeamSpeak IP, come join the fun!
TerraScape and MCZone = Old server names
Staff = To apply for staff, you must wait for apps to open. When they do, you must write a detailed application explaining why you deserve mod. If the app is good enough, you will be interviewed. If you pass the interview, you will receive Junior Moderator for a month. If you are good enough, you will receive moderator.

replies.body:
Idk= I don't know.
Idek= I don't even know.
ASL: Age, sex and location.
TB= Text back.
FTW= For the win.
WTF: What the f**k.
WTH: What the hell.
BTW= By the way.
TBH= To be honest.
IMO= In my opinion.
FYI= For your information.
MYOB= Mind your own business.
AKA= Also known as.
ASAP= As soon as possible.
ATM= At the moment.
RN= Right now.
TY= Thank you.
BRB= Be right back.
SOS= Save our souls.
BYOB= Bring your own beer.
Idc= I don't care.
FU= F**k you.
BIH= Burn in hell.
GTG= Go to go.
Idec= I don't even care.
ILY= I love you.
M8= might.
r8= Right.
Avicusers= Avicus' users.
AVN= Avicus Network.
OCN= Overcast Network.
GJ= Good job.
Thx= Thanks.
Y= Why.
DIKY= Do I know you...?
WB= Welcome back!
GL= Good luck.
DGB= DaGoldBrick.
Ofc= Of course!
BF= Best friend / Boyfriend... :/ "He is my BF".... :/
VIP= Very Important Person.
FFS= For F**k sake.
NASA= National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
NOKY= No one knows you.
4U= For you.
NTY= No, thank you....
OMG= Oh my gosh.
OMFG= Oh my f**king gosh.
JK= Joke.
Soz= Sorry.
Np= No problem.
YW= Your welcome.
AMA= Ask me anything.
TS= TeamSpeak.
Ik= I know.
DIY= Do it yourself.
Tho= Though.
WAS= Wait a second.
Idm= I don't mind.
kthxbye= Okay, thanks! Bye...
TM= Trade Mark.
IYAA= If you are agreed.
FAQ= Frequently asked questions.
DMWM= Don't mess with me.
B4= Before.
8r= Either 
Cya= See you.
l8r= Later.
W8= Wait.
AYO= Are you okay?
Dunno= I don't know.
'Cuz= Because.
G'B= Good Bye.
Bruh= Brother.
FO: Fuck off.
K/D= Kill per death. 
PvP K/D= Kill per being killed.
NEI= Not Enough Items.
OF= Optifine. 
CTW= Capture the wool.
DTM= Destroy the monument.
TDM= Team Dead match.
FYFI= For your f**king information.
ILY2= I love you too!
ILYM= I love you more!
DTMA= Don't talk me again.
SV= Server.
WEYS...= Whatever you say...
Apps= Staff applications.
SC= ScriptingCookies
DMI= Don't mention it.
WD= Well deserved!

Sorry for not bring enough, but I had not enough time :c

replies.body:
I assume this is just the beginning cause there is much more you can touch.
  • Gamemodes
  • Ranks
  • How to edit your Profile
  • Commands
  • Punishments
Just to name a few.Also it isn't the wisest idea to have negative slang words such as eZ, bg in the OP in my opinion. Also you could add forum slang such as inb4, OP and imo etc.Also I feel you need to use the bolding, italics and headings more and properly format the post to be more professional (as this is used by new players you want it to be easily navigated and read). Also I would the change the thread name to something like "New Player's Guide to Avicus" or something  similiar as this is more informative then "For new players."
All in all it's a nice start but you still got a long way to go. :)

/Register

Usage: /register (password)
Then you go to avicus.net/login, then enter your user name and the password you used when you used /register. (write it down in case you forget!)

/Register

Usage: /register (password)
